description:
The first chance to see the new series of Sherlock will occur this year.粉丝们今年将有望一睹新一季《神探夏洛克》的首次亮相。

On Sunday December 15 2013 at 13:00GMT, the British Film Institute will show S3E1: The Empty Hearse in a public screening at the National Film Theatre on London's Southbank, ahead of the yet to be announced first television airing in the UK on the BBC. The premiere will be followed by a Q&A with members of the cast and crew who will be in attendance.英国时间2013年12月15日星期天下午13点，英国电影学院将在位于伦敦南岸的国家电影院举行该剧第三季第一集《空灵柩》的首映礼。而该剧第三季在英国BBC电视台的首播时间尚未公布。该剧的剧组成员和工作人员将到场出席首映礼，并参加随后的观众提问环节。

相关阅读：《神探夏洛克》第三季首张官方剧照发布>>>

Two years after the devastating events of 'The Reichenbach Fall', John appears to have got on with his life. New horizons and romance beckon. But, with London under threat of a devastating terrorist attack, Sherlock is about to take John at his word, staging his resurrection with all the theatricality that comes so naturally to him. If Sherlock thinks everything will be just as he left it, though, he's in for a very big surprise...恐怖的“莱辛巴赫的坠落”发生两年之后，华生终于开始了新生活。新的前途和新的感情都在向他招手。但正在这时伦敦正受到恐怖袭击的严重威胁，于是正如华生两年前曾经期望的，福尔摩斯戏剧性的复活了——这对于他似乎是再自然不过了。福尔摩斯以为一切都和他两年前假死时一样，但现实情况却让他大吃一惊……

The screening is effectively a repeat of the premiere of S2E1: A Scandal in Belgravia, which premiered on December 7 2011, almost a month before the first television airing on January 1 2012. Tickets for that event sold out within hours of being released.第三季的首映礼将和第二季的首映礼《贝尔戈维亚丑闻》保持一致。《贝尔戈维亚丑闻》首映礼是在2011年12月7日举行的，大约一个月之后，2012年1月1日第二季开始在电视上首播。第二季首映礼的门票在发票后数小时内就被抢购一空。
